Hi all,
I have to write a WPF application that provides for the simultaneous writing of 4 people, each in its own surfacetextbox.
Is it possible to activate more than one keyboard simultaneously and each writes in his surfacetextbox?
What is the exact row on which to change?

Tnk,
Chianco

Hi Chianco,

You would need to pull down the source for the WPF Keyboard and make some changes. Firstly you'd need to show the four keyboards on the screen which shouldn't be hard at all. Next you'll need to replace where the InputSimulator is used since this simulates system-wide input events and will enter text into the textbox that currently has focus. Instead of using InputSimulator, just target the text directly into the textbox appropriate for that keyboard.

Kind Regards,
Mike
